website_summaries.verdict: Despite its budget-friendly price, many users were surprised by the quality and performance of the Nike Tiempo Genio II Leather Firm Ground. For one, it is the most lightweight soccer cleat in the line. The leather upper of this soccer cleat proved to be effective in providing comfort. It is not a surprise then that most wearers commended its overall quality. For an affordable price, this soccer cleat is the wise choice for the budget and for the firm ground game.
pros: The Nike Tiempo Genio II Leather Firm Ground was a great value soccer cleat given its affordable price tag, as mentioned by a majority of buyers
Many players appreciated the lightweight nature of this soccer cleat
A lot of users were happy with the comfortable fit of this soccer cleat, especially after the break-in period
Players with wide foot said that the Nike Tiempo Genio II Leather Firm Ground fits them just right
Some reviewers observed that this soccer cleat is a great improvement from the original model
The launch colorway of the Nike Tiempo Genio II Leather FG received nods from a couple of individuals
A couple of commenters appreciated Nike’s effort to include the internal support cage found in top-tier models
cons: Many users were disappointed because the Nike Tiempo Genio II Leather Firm Ground did not last more than six months
The sole plate started ripping off the soccer cleat after a few games
One reviewer complained of stud pressure under the balls of his feet

customer_reviews.title: they feel soft and colors are super cute. Just to be clear
customer_reviews.text: these cleats are decent, they feel soft and colors are super cute. Just to be clear, these are men sizes for cleats, but they run smaller than other nike cleats I've had. I was confused because of some of the comments saying they ran in women's sizes so that's what I ordered, and they are too big if you order your regular woman's size, but I wouldn't go the full size and half down to get your men's size, more like a half size to maybe a full size down.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Box came destroyed.
customer_reviews.text: The box came completely destroyed and the cleats arrived frayed as well as had cuts on the sides of the cleats. Not largely noticeable, but I did notice without need of close inspection.
customer_reviews.author: CAT

customer_reviews.title: Great quality shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Super nice quality! My 13 year old son has wide feet and ALL SOCCER SHOES are narrow to fit closely in order to feel the ball, but these leather shoes will stretch with his toes for a more comfortable fit. I've read Nikes are more forgiving in the toe box for soccer shoes. Overall he is very pleased; he says they're the nicest shoes he's ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: it is to small
customer_reviews.text: i have lost 2 toe nails trying to wear them, i was disappointed with the cheap fake material they are made-off, it doesn't dry well at all, and it gets really heavy when wet. Besides that is actually a good shoe durable and it doesn't break easy, seems to be reliable and it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice model, soft leather, short life
customer_reviews.text: Soft leather, light shoes, but a little too tight . I had previous model. I had it for ~10 years. It is bonded leather ( but it can hold good). After ~10 soccer games, the leather started to break in several places, my old pair look better . Adidas copa is a better model....
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great fit = womens wide
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has a wide foot. It is very hard to find wide soccer cleats. Especially for women. I was advised ar a sporting goods store to get her mens because they run wider. These cleats were pretty even though they are really for men. I used the size chart for nike to compare mens sizes to womens and got a great fit. She loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Jill M.

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been playing in these for a couple months now and they are great. I like that they have padding but are not heavy. The quality is great, just one of the reasons I love tiempo. I would definitely recommend these cleats.
customer_reviews.author: Moes

customer_reviews.title: I recommend going a half size bigger. They run half size smaller.
customer_reviews.text: I have been 8.5 for more than 15 years for some reason the 8.5 were too tight. So I returned it and got 9. 1st day a little bit tight next game perfect. I would have given it a 5 if it had been perfect size. So I recommend going a half size bigger. They run smaller than what they are.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Women's Cleats not running shoes and not men's
customer_reviews.text: The description needs to be corrected. If you go by woman's sizes you'll be fine. The description is messed up. It says wmn running shoe but men's sizes. In reality they are women's cleats in women's sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy W.

customer_reviews.title: Fits a little small, buy at least a half-size larger than you usually wear
customer_reviews.text: Usually wear a size 11 in Nike, NB, Reebok, but am wearing a 11.5 in these bots. Even then they feel a little snug, but not unwearable. I expect they'll break in being leather, and will feel more comfortable over time. Once I'm sure I'm not returning them I may do the old military trick of wearing them in the bathtub to let them conform to my feet! I think that will work wonders for these.
customer_reviews.author: Craig White

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality leather
customer_reviews.text: Only shoe front is of genuine leather. Bad quality leather. Your foot wobbles when it's wet. You might feel tight when it's dry... And it smells awful
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Love the vibrant colors and comfort. Soft leather so they look and feel great!
customer_reviews.author: Lizzie

customer_reviews.title: Poor construction quality, come apart quickly.
customer_reviews.text: My son who plays JV soccer made it through one practice in these before the toe seam started to separate. After a game the separation is 3 times bigger. Maybe after a couple more games he can see all of his toes! Returning these poorly constructed cleats.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Norton

customer_reviews.title: You need to buy a full size bigger and if ...
customer_reviews.text: You need to buy a full size bigger and if you have wide feet stay away from these.Way too narrow.
customer_reviews.author: van405

customer_reviews.title: I have purchased this exact same model many times before ...
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this exact same model many times before in the exact same size, however this pair are definitely somewhat smaller - I don't know if they will loosen at all and I have played (tried to) about 5 games in them so far.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: But they look good yo me
customer_reviews.text: Is a gift i have not received they feedback yet. But they look good yo me.
customer_reviews.author: ramone

customer_reviews.title: Splurge on a $100 pair of cleats instead
customer_reviews.text: The bottom is a really thick piece of plastic. Opted to return instead of attempting to break them in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: I got a second pair because they aren't expensive and last at least a couple months, rather tight toe box but no blisters.
customer_reviews.author: Benton Habel

customer_reviews.title: Great rugby cleats
customer_reviews.text: Great rugby cleats. Had a old pair of Nike Tiempos I used for 8 years that never busted out. That's saying something after going through 6 rugby full seasons, 2 7's seasons and countless amount of touch sessions. Nike Tiempo's fits my feet perfectly and seem to be super durable
customer_reviews.author: Wfaulkner

customer_reviews.title: Order 1 size up
customer_reviews.text: It’s a light cleat, but it runs small, so order a size up.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla Oliveira

customer_reviews.title: Great cleats.
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes, both of my sons wear only Nike Tiempos... but they are 1-1.5 size smaller than actual size listed.
customer_reviews.author: Donny

customer_reviews.title: 👎🏿👎🏿👎🏿👎🏿👎🏿👎🏿
customer_reviews.text: Really bad, I kick footballs 🏈 in and it missed up from the first day👎🏿
customer_reviews.author: Atkilt

customer_reviews.title: I used to buy nike as my favorite brand for soccer shoes but my not very used ...
customer_reviews.text: I used to buy nike as my favorite brand for soccer shoes but my not very used shoes are completely broken
customer_reviews.author: Juan R.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good shoes for the price. Let's see how much the last!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit very comfortable even in a turfy kinda grass they don't feel like you are standing on nails.
customer_reviews.author: Marco

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Item listed as mens cleats, received them to find them as boys cleats.
customer_reviews.author: Karyn S.

customer_reviews.title: and the leather have a good
customer_reviews.text: there are very comfortables, and the leather have a good quality
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great product..had a pair of these n lost n jus had to replace them. Kudos to nike for this product and amazon.com for having them
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Stiching coming loose.
customer_reviews.text: Less than 30 days of use and they are coming apart at the seams everywhere!
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Terrible cleats. Only have worn these cleats to practice for 2 months and they are coming apart. Bottom of shoe has separated, lining has ripped out and green color comes off on socks. Expected these cleats to last longer. Never had this happen to Nike cleats before.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the shoe for the price
customer_reviews.text: Happy with the shoe for the price. It's a little smaller than I expected. Interestingly, I have an older pair of Tiempos that are the same size and fit perfectly, so I'm hoping these just need to stretch a little bit.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah

customer_reviews.title: These are nice comfortable boots
customer_reviews.text: I would advise to buy at lease half a size or one size up. I wear a US 9.5 but i ordered a 10 and it still felt a bit tight. It took me about two training sessions to get break them in. These are nice comfortable boots.
customer_reviews.author: O Ashion

customer_reviews.title: Need a bigger size
customer_reviews.text: These would probably be great cleats. But they don't fit, I have had other Nike cleats size 8 1/2 and there were great. But these are way to tight. I couldn't play even half a game with them on.
customer_reviews.author: steven

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe for the Price.
customer_reviews.text: It's hard enough to buy size 14 soccer cleats !!! I found these for my son and for the price, I had to try them. Received them and he tried them on. They were a little snug, but we are talking about a size 14 foot! For the price is these shoes, they are well worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: TKO4JESUS

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: i orderer a 10 size shoe but it was too small, not that size
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy your size, or this product
customer_reviews.text: I have been a size 10 1/2 since highschool and have had many cleats in the same size, this product is alot smaller than normal. If I were you I would buy another cleat at the actual store so you know they fit. But, for some reason if you do want to buy this product buy a size bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Vasquez

product_meta.title: Nike Men's Tiempo Genio Ii Leather Fg Football Boots
product_meta.description: The Nike tiempo genio ii leather men's firm-ground soccer cleat excels on short-grass fields with bladed and conical cleats placed in strategic locations. A soft, full-grain leather upper offers precise dribbling, passing and striking.
